name: 16 Planes:Return
description:
"Sixteen Faces: Return" is a horrible, slightly bloody plot to solve puzzles. The main content of the game is about the hero in a series of strange dreams, waking up in his bed, but the outside world is no longer the same world, so he embarked on the journey to find the truth.
The game contains thrilling pictures and scenes. Players with heart disease or poor acceptance should be accompanied by friends to play the game. In the follow-up, they will make friends or LAN online mode.Game features
·Rich Achievement System
·Numerous props for interaction
·bonus scene
·Voice system dubbed by the producer
·Various plot trends for players to choose
·Open end
